about: I'm a front-end developer who is constantly striving to improve my skills and create engaging and user-friendly web applications. Although I don't have professional experience in the field yet, I've been dedicated to learning and expanding my knowledge through personal projects and online courses. My goal is to provide accessible and responsive web applications that deliver an amazing user experience. I'm excited to work with you to bring your vision to life. Let's collaborate and create something amazing together!
